title: Graham Hicks
content:
[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116034220/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116034220/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers)

Graham Hicks is an interaction and graphic designer, [Test Pilot Collective](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116034220/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Test%20Pilot%20Collective) contributor and a two time winner of the Typophile Tee contest. He works as an Interaction Designer at [IDEO](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116034220/http:/typophile.com/wiki/IDEO) in San Francisco, California

Website: [http://www.grahamhicks.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116034220/http:/www.grahamhicks.com/ "http://www.grahamhicks.com")
author: gmh
